rows.label: qev013103_MSG0008
rows.name:
There's only two people that know about this place,
and you're not one of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0009
rows.name:
How did someone who's not part of the
Celeste Three possibly find me here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_SEL0021
rows.name: Try to negotiate a peaceful resolution.

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0002
rows.name: Bring it on! I'd planned on burying you here anyway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0010
rows.name: What? Fosdyke and Moorehouse sold me out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0003
rows.name:
No... Those two wouldn't betray me...
They couldn't![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_SEL0031
rows.name: Lay out the full story to Briggs.

rows.label: qev013103_SEL0041
rows.name: Accuse Briggs of being the betrayer.

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0004
rows.name: You're lying... Trying to mess with my mind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0005
rows.name: Well, I'm not falling for it. You die here, liar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0006
rows.name: That's insane! The three of us swore an oath![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013103_MSG0007
rows.name: I'm not falling for your lies! You die here, liar![ST:wait ]
